data.text: @plymouthian It's a farce. But sheeple are lapping it up. It's the next huge bandwagon for them to get on board.

@plymouthian @LizaUK3 It's surprising there haven't been any lawsuits against the gov and medical authorities for covid vaccine side effects. It's looking like they will face no consequences for coercing experimental vaccines. @abiroberts

@plymouthian Listerally nearly everything I see on here relating to the MSM Iautomatically think "well thats bollox". I say on here because I don't watch or read any MSM news anymore. Turned my TV off 2 years ago.

The greater good can kiss my ass.
